document: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvhmq","text":"1. Protein was extracted from cultured rat astrocytes using membrane solubilization buffer (25 mM Tris pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 1 mM CaCl2, 1 mM MgCl2, 0.5% NP-40, and protease inhibitors). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":133,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":145,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3thvk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3d6ii","text":"2. Cultured astrocytes were washed twice with ice-cold TBS containing 1 mM CaCl2and 1 mM MgCl2and incubated on ice in membrane solubilization buffer for 20 minutes with occasional agitation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":79,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":93,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vb86","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebps8","text":"3. Cell lysates were collected, vortexed briefly, and centrifuged at 4°C at high speed for 10 minutes to pellet non-solubilized material. The supernatant was collected and stored at −80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79h1c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1a19i","text":"4. Pierce BSA Protein Assay Kit (Thermo Fisher) was used to determine protein concentration, and lysates were mixed with 4× Pierce™ Reducing Sample Buffer (Thermo Scientific) and incubated at 45°C for 45 minutes to denature proteins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnf6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do9n0","text":"5. 7-10 μg (cultured astrocyte lysates) of protein was loaded into Bolt™ 4–12% Bus-Tris Plus gels (Thermo Scientific) and run at 150 V for 1 hour. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aaa5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cf6lt","text":"6. Proteins were transferred at 100 V to PVDF membrane (Millipore) for 1.5 hours, blocked in 5% BSA in TBST (137 mM NaCl, 2.68 mM KCl, 24.7 mM Tris-Base, 0.1% (w/v) Tween 20) for 1 hour and incubated in primary antibodies overnight at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3cdc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dsvb","text":"7. Primary antibodies used were: anti-LRRK2 (Rabbit, 1:500; ab133474, abcam), GAPDH (mouse, 1:5000; ab8245, abcam), β-actin (mouse, 1:5000; A5441, Millipore Sigma), phospho-ERM (Rabbit, 1:500; #3141, Cell Signaling), ERM (Rabbit, 1:500; #3142, Cell Signaling), phospho-Rab10 (Rabbit, 1:500; ab230261, abcam), Rab10 (Rabbit, 1:500; ab237703, abcam). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alikv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s4lc","text":"8. The next day, membranes were washed with TBST, incubated in HRP secondary antibodies (Thermo Fisher Scientific) for 2 hours, washed in TBST, and imaged on a Biorad Gel Doc imaging system. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be0nu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"feaku","text":"9. Protein levels were quantified using FIJI.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protein extraction and Western blotting
